text: aur isee tarah hamane apane hukm ko rooh (quraan) tumhaaree taraph vahee ke zarie se bheje to tum na kitaab hee ko jaanate the ki kya hai aur na eemaan ko magar is (quraan) ko ek noor banaaya hai ki isase ham apane bandon mein se jisakee chaahate hain hidaayat karate hain aur isamen shaq nahin ki tum (ai rasool) seedha hee raasta dikhaate ho
